title: How can I downgrade from Android 11 to 10 on Pixel 3 locked ?
content:
Hello. I just sideloaded android 11 on pixel 3 but I cannot downgrade because it's locked version (cannot OEM Unlocking) and I just recently know that OEM unlock is necessary to downgrade. So, I want to know that is there any way that I can downgrade on locked device ? 

Thank you
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
